code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{Form,Input,Button,notification}from'antd';import axios from'axios';import'./ForgotPassword.css';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ForgotPassword=()=>{const[loading,setLoading]=useState(false);const[userId,setUserId]=useState('');const handleResetPassword=async()=>{setLoading(true);try{const response=await axios.post('http://localhost:4150/ForgotPassword',{userId});notification.success({message:'Password Reset',description:response.data.message});}catch(error){var _error$response;notification.error({message:'Error',description:((_error$response=error.response)===null||_error$response===void 0?void 0:_error$response.data.message)||'An error occurred while resetting the password'});}setLoading(false);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"forgot-password-container",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"forgot-password-form",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"forgot-password-header",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Reset Password"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Form,{name:"forgot-password-form",onFinish:handleResetPassword,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Form.Item,{name:"userId",rules:[{required:true,message:'Please enter your ID'}],children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Input,{onChange:e=>setUserId(e.target.value),placeholder:"ID"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Form.Item,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{type:"primary",htmlType:"submit",loading:loading,style:{width:'100%'},children:"\u0627\u0639\u0627\u062F\u0629 \u062A\u0639\u064A\u064A\u0646 \u0643\u0644\u0645\u0629 \u0627\u0644\u0645\u0631\u0648\u0631"})})]})]})});};export default ForgotPassword;
